text:
Through Thy precious body
broken

Inside the veil;

Oh! what words to sinners


526L.txt

knows no measure
Outside the camp.

Soon Thy saints

shall all be gathered
Inside the veil;

All at home,

no more be scattered,
Inside the veil.
Nought from Thee,
our hearts shall sever;
We shall see Thee;
grieve Thee never;
“Praise the Lamb!”
shall sound forever
Inside the veil
